title: Problem 2111_D
statement: A new semester is about to begin, and it is necessary to create a schedule for the first day. There are a total of n groups and m classrooms in the faculty. It is also known that each group has exactly 6 classes on the first day, and the k-th class of each group takes place at the same time. Each class must be held in a classroom, and at the same time, there cannot be classes for more than one group in the same classroom.Each classroom has its own index (at least three digits), and all digits of
